Package org.dellroad.stuff.spring

Spring related classes.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ThreadConfigurableObject Marker interface used by the ThreadConfigurableAspect.
 

Class Summary
AbstractBeanDefinitionParser Support superclass for BeanDefinitionParser implementations.
ApplicationContextBean Bean that exposes the containing application context via the ApplicationObjectSupport.getApplicationContext() property.
BeanNameComparator A Comparator that orders Spring bean names in the same order as the corresponding beans appear in a ListableBeanFactory.
DelayedAction Manages a delayed action without race conditions.
DellRoadStuffNamespaceHandler Spring NamespaceHandler for the dellroad-stuff XML namespace.
HibernateIsolationJpaDialect Hibernate JPA adapter that adds supports for setting a non-default transaction isolation level.
PostCompletion Supports requesting the execution of post-completion callbacks when running within @PostCompletionSupport-annotated methods.
PostCompletionRegistry Registry of post-completion callbacks.
ResourceReaderFactoryBean Spring factory bean that reads in a Spring Resource and converts it to a String.
ThreadLocalContext Associates a ConfigurableApplicationContext with each thread.
ThreadTransactionalAdapter Adapter that converts a @ThreadTransactional annotation into a @Transactional one.
ThreadTransactionalAnnotationParser Strategy implementation for parsing the @ThreadTransactional annotation.
 

Annotation Types Summary
PostCompletionSupport Method-level annotation that allows threads executing within the annotated method to request the execution of post-completion callbacks.
ThreadConfigurable Indicates that the class is a candidate for configuration using the ThreadConfigurableAspect aspect.
ThreadTransactional Works just like Spring's @Transactional annotation, but instead of using a fixed PlatformTransactionManager stored in a static variable and determined once at startup, this annotation uses a PlatformTransactionManager found dynamically at runtime in the application context that is associated with the current thread by the ThreadLocalContext singleton.
 

Package org.dellroad.stuff.spring Description

Spring related classes.

This package implements the <dellroad-stuff:sql> and <dellroad-stuff:sql-update> custom Spring XML elements; these define beans of type SQLCommandList and SpringSQLSchemaUpdate, respectively.

This package also implements the <dellroad-stuff:post-completion> custom Spring XML element.

See Also:
SQLCommandList, SpringSQLSchemaUpdate, PostCompletionSupport, Spring Framework
